---------------

### Tender Title

The Department of Public Works and Government Services announces a Request for Proposal (RFP):

**Spectrograph and Streak Camera Imager System**

### Tender Reference

* **Reference Number:** WS3744824114-Doc4272611277
* **Source List Number:** None

### Description

The Department of National Defence (DND), specifically the DRDC Suffield Research Centre, requires a state-of-the-art Spectrograph and Streak Camera Imager System for conducting time-resolved spectroscopy for single-shot events in the ultraviolet to visible spectral range. The imager system will facilitate the capture of high-quality images and spectra of transient events. Interested proposers must submit their bids in accordance with the requirements outlined in the RFP document.

### Tender Details

* **Tender Type:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Contract Duration:** 1 month (from 2023-12-22 to 2023-01-31)
* **Contract Closing Date:** 2023-11-21 at 14:00 EST
* **Late Bids:** Any bid submission after the specified time and date will be considered non-responsive.

### Bidding Instructions

Proposers must submit their bids electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform. The required supporting documentation and bid submission must be completed and received by the closing date.

The proposed Spectrograph and Streak Camera Imager System must meet the minimum functional requirements and performance specifications detailed in the RFP document. Interested proposers must address the following key aspects:

* Technical Approach
* Methodology for Data Collection and Analysis
* Quality and Performance Standards of the proposed solution
* Project Schedule and Milestones
* Price

### Evaluation Criteria

The Government of Canada reserves the right to evaluate bids based on the following criteria:

* Lowest Price

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarification regarding this RFP, please contact Lee, Oana (SPAC/PSPC) at oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
